column4: I have seen a lot of network traffic across my wifi interface in the last week and think my 10.10 install might have been infected/compromised. Is there a way to check this?
I know, but I can't account for why the spike in network traffic across my wifi interface... any ideas?
Virus is the only thing that makes sense (probably because I don't know a lot about the inner workings of linux)
You may have a virus on a windows box, but not on Linux.
